Package com.mhealthatlas.enterprisemanagement.controller

Class EnterpriseManagementQueryController

java.lang.Object
com.mhealthatlas.enterprisemanagement.controller.EnterpriseManagementQueryController
@Controller
@RequestMapping("/enterprise-management")
public class EnterpriseManagementQueryController
extends java.lang.Object
EnterpriseManagementQueryController is the class containing all API endpoints for quering enterprise informations in the mHealthAtlas system.

  • Method Details

    • getEnterprises

      @GetMapping("/enterprises") @ResponseStatus(OK) @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_Admin\')") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<EnterprisesDto> getEnterprises()
      Queries the enterprise management service for all enterprises.

      The method can be invoked with an HTTP GET request calling /enterprises

      Only mHealthAtlas administrators are permitted to call this API endpoint.

      Returns:
      the found enterprises

    • getEnterprise

      @GetMapping("/enterprises/{name}") @ResponseStatus(OK) @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<EnterpriseDetailDto> getEnterprise​(@PathVariable java.lang.String name, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Queries the enterprise management service by an enterprise name to retrieve detailed enterprise informations.

      The method can be invoked with an HTTP GET request calling /enterprises/{name}

      Only mHealthAtlas, health insurance and company administrators are permitted to call this API endpoint. Health insurance and company administrators can only call this API endpoint for "their" enterprise.

      Parameters:
      name - the enterprise name; not null; required query parameter
      authentication - the authentication object, injected by spring security
      Returns:
      200 OK response containing the enterprise information if the enterprise was found;
      404 NOT_FOUND response if the enterprise was not found;
      403 FORBIDDEN response otherwise;
